name: Skia4Delphi
description: Skia4Delphi is a cross-platform 2D graphics API for Delphi platforms based on Google's Skia Graphics Library. It provides a comprehensive 2D API that can be used across mobile, server and desktop models to render images.

name: Spring4Delphi
description: Spring4D is an open-source code library for Embarcadero Delphi XE and higher. It consists of a number of different modules that contain a base class library (common types, interface based collection types, reflection extensions) and a dependency injection framework. It uses the Apache License 2.0.

name: WebView4Delphi
description: WebView4Delphi is an open source project created by Salvador DÃ­az Fau to embed Edge/Chromium-based browsers in applications made with Delphi or Lazarus/FPC for Windows.

name: Horse
description: Horse is an Express inspired web framework for Delphi and Lazarus. Designed to ease things up for fast development in a minimalist way and with high performance.
